scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch:scss" " npm run dev"
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin contacto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacto.html && usemin precios.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/precios.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run watch:scss && npm run usemin
